comments.body:
There is a bug here: smartTruncate is a default export, see here: https://github.com/millerized/smart-truncate/blob/master/src/smart-truncate.js#L51

So, this should be "export default function smartTruncate".

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4,8 @@// Definitions: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped

export function smartTruncate(text: string, length: number, options?: { position?: number; mark?: string }): string;
